name: Mystic Seas
description:
- Mystic Seas is a local multiplayer, cooperative game -

This game was created as part of the Search For a Star Design event!

For this game, one player will need to use the mouse and keyboard whilst the other player uses a gamepad.

Mystic Seas is a cooperative game, which allows the player to pick between 2 roles, a Coastguard and an Outlaw.

The Coastguard must provide light for the Outlaw, otherwise their boat will start losing structural integrity.

The Outlaw must listen to the Coastguards callouts and follow their instructions.

The end objective is to fully power the generator using plugs that can be found around the ocean.
